page.title: 15EVENTS
page.content: Annual Harvest Festivals are held in all three Chapels and SOUTH HILL CHURCH. In the Chapels evening concerts and suppers celebrate Harvest Festival,Foundation and Sunday School Anniversaries,maany people returning to the district to share the rejoicing."Favourite Hymn" evenings are popular,congregations of all creeds visiting each others'place of worship for these occasions. In STOKE CLIMSLAND an increasingly large produce show is held annually, drawing many entries in it's open classes. It is followed by a Carnival with prizes for individual entries. decorated floats and Majorettes.There is a competition for the best Carnival Queen entourage also with many entries There are also commercial stalls. Annual Sheep Dog trials take place drawing many entries from afar.
